response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire this item at a competitive rate, while still allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
